bill.summary: 2/12/2002--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to establish a program to provide environmental assistance to non-Federal interests in Allegheny, Beaver, Butler, Lawrence, and Mercer Counties, Pennsylvania, for publicly owned water supply, water resource protection, waste, and environmental restoration projects.
